word: Both in public and in private worship, it is our privilege to bow on our knees before the Lord when we offer our petitions to Him. Jesus, our example, \93kneeled down, and prayed.\94 Of His disciples it is recorded that they, too, \93kneeled down, and prayed.\94 Paul declared, \93I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.\94 In confessing before God the sins of Israel, Ezra knelt. Daniel \93kneeled upon his knees three times a day, and prayed, and gave thanks before his God.\94
